PostContent:
My First Bitcoin Success Story.

When the price of Bitcoin drops a lot. Then I buy bitcoins with some of my savings. And tell my friends to buy some bitcoins too.  A few of my friends bought some bitcoins with me.

The Bitcoin market has been bearish for a long time.
Many then Many people are commenting on Bitcoin. I have some friends who used to criticize this bitcoin a lot. They were saying that the price of Bitcoin would never go up. Gradually the price will fall further. But I did not give up hope. I was so patient that the price of Bitcoin would go up I knew. And researched Bitcoin.

Now with me who was buying bitcoins. They are very happy. Their dreams have come true.

And those who criticized a lot. They are regretting it now.
Then I told them. It is not right to comment on something without researching it.  I have been doing a lot of research on Bitcoin. Then investing and asking others to do it.  Now they are showing a lot of interest in Bitcoin.

Take a lesson from here. That If someone wants to invest. Then do your own research. Never make bad comments about other people  And patience is the biggest thing. He who is patient will definitely get success.

I shared an incident that happened to me. If any such incident happens to you, please let us know.
PostTitle: Bitcoin is the first success story

PostContent:
Quote from: tisnaislam111 on March 18, 2023, 08:50:25 AM
When the price of Bitcoin drops a lot. Then I buy bitcoins with some of my savings. And tell my friends to buy some bitcoins too.  A few of my friends bought some bitcoins with me.
Alright just make it simple, just post your Bitcoin address and sign a message to prove your ownership, otherwise you're lying and not telling the truth. The recent dump was at March 10, 2023 and November 10, 2022 - Early January, 2023, so must be bought Bitcoin at those date where Bitcoin was declining.

There's no any rumor or news about the upcoming Bitcoin adoption, I think everyone also surprised to see Bitcoin price suddenly increase since it's unpredictable.

It is your money and it is your decision after your research. I congratulate you for your early or first success with your Bitcoin investment. However, let me send you a reminder. Getting profit in cryptocurrency market is easy, sometimes more easily than you think BUT protecting your profit and your capital in this market is MORE DIFFICULT.

Perhaps you have yet known about it and have yet experienced about it but time will help you understand.

Quote
I shared an incident that happened to me. If any such incident happens to you, please let us know.
The only thing I never believe in anyone who only share about their success in this market but never told about their failures, loses make me less believe in their stories. If you are newbies, your story can be true but if you are in this market a few years and never had any loses, that story is untrue.

PostTitle: Re: Bitcoin is the first success story

PostContent:
I would say your friends that invested with you got lucky.  When it comes to investing or anything that has to with something using their money to participate I try as much as possible to avoid involving others because you never can tell what will be the end result and if it turns out to be a scam you'll be the one that they till blame everything on.

But in your case they just happened to make some profit because the price shot up but what if they price went the opposite direction instead what would you have done?
Op,  next time just tell them about bitcoin what it is, and how it works but never try to force them to invest in it let them make that decision by themselves.

Btw, congratulations Op.

OP just informed us that he has made some profit from the coins he purchased when the price was low and he is celebrating his success story. Yes, there was no news about the current mini-bull run but there are countless materials that predict the rise in the price of Bitcoin. Although many of these predictions are not precise but they always remind us to be patient and brave because hodling will always bring good news.

The current fall of some regional banks in the US and Switzerland ( Silicon Valley Bank and  Credit Suisse) might be the direct or indirect reason for the rise in the price of bitcoin. Maybe people are beginning to understand that banks cannot be trusted. The legendary American actress Sharon Stone recently revealed that she has lost half of her fortune in Silicon Valley Bank. That's why some people might be buying Bitcoin so that they can own and control their money.

PostContent:
Quote from: Jawhead999 on March 18, 2023, 09:04:10 AM
Alright just make it simple, just post your Bitcoin address and sign a message to prove your ownership, otherwise you're lying and not telling the truth. The recent dump was at March 10, 2023 and November 10, 2022 - Early January, 2023, so must be bought Bitcoin at those date where Bitcoin was declining.

There's no any rumor or news about the upcoming Bitcoin adoption, I think everyone also surprised to see Bitcoin price suddenly increase since it's unpredictable.

I am fed up with this kind of stories, which are a blatant attempt at merit fishing. When they are accompanied by evidence, like photos or screenshots, I can believe them, but not the kind of story the OP tells, unless it is accompanied by a signed message to back it up, as you say. In a Spanish forum that I visit, not signing a message to prove what he says could lead to a massive report and a ban, although in this one, which is so tough for certain things, this doesn't happen. This is with some exception, as the OP could claim that he has the bitcoins on Coinbase or some similar site and cannot sign a message.
PostTitle: Re: Bitcoin is the first success story

PostContent:
However, there are people whose risk tolerance is so low that Bitcoin might not really be for them. There are those who criticize Bitcoin as an investment. For me, the real reason isn't what they're telling the public like Bitcoin doesn't have intrinsic value, it is not properly regulated, it lacks consumer protection, it's too volatile, and so on and so forth.

The truth may be that Bitcoin simply isn't for them. They simply can't take that investment in Bitcoin could mean that their portfolio could lose 80% of its value. They cannot bear that possibility.
PostTitle: Re: Bitcoin is the first success story

PostContent:
There are many friends in our society who find all our activities a joke. No matter what you do, there will always be some friends who oppose you. But they really don't know that well. For example, you invested in Bitcoin knowing everything, but because of bad market conditions, the price of Bitcoin could not increase and your friend made fun of you for your failure.I say stay away from these guys. Those who will not learn anything themselves and will not allow others to learn anything can never be friends.

You hold bitcoins longer and trust bitcoins. Surely you will be successful one day and your friends will be sorry to see you.
PostTitle: Re: Bitcoin is the first success story

PostContent: There are people whom I told about Bitcoin and that I believe it will rise. The price was around $6k at that point, it was after the 2018 price drop. They said that they think Bitcoin is shady, a financial pyramid. I didn't put much effort into convincing them of the opposite, I merely outlined why I think they are wrong. Yet these were the kind of people who would never recognize they were wrong. They just forget that they were and never admit that I was right or think of investing in Bitcoin (or that there was a time when it was the right thing to do). So I think those friends of the op who are regretting something at least recognized their mistakes and might learn from them, which makes it a positive story.
PostTitle: Re: Bitcoin is the first success story

PostContent:
Quote from: tisnaislam111 on March 18, 2023, 08:50:25 AM
My First Bitcoin Success Story.

When the price of Bitcoin drops a lot. Then I buy bitcoins with some of my savings. And tell my friends to buy some bitcoins too.  A few of my friends bought some bitcoins with me.

OP, I feel you made your friends think of Bitcoin as a get-rich-quick scheme, which it is not; maybe you would have given them a better explanation had the Bitcoin price not increased. Did you think telling them about the risk would make them decide not to invest? Promoting Bitcoin means telling people the full details about it, because when you tell them the only thing they want to hear is, "Invest now and when the price goes up, you will make profit." That's a bad promotion habit and could also cause your friends to blame you and think bad of Bitcoin.
PostTitle: Re: Bitcoin is the first success story

PostContent: Of course, when you buy something at a low price and then have the patience to wait and when the price is getting high then it can be time to smile and celebrate. Your success story is not something new and there are now many people who got benefitted by the journey of Bitcoin to the top...though we must say that this journey has been an up and down experience. Those who did not have the diamond hands always will be regretting when the time is getting good. Congrats on your Bitcoin success story!
